price: "Que receou aO Misericordioso, ainda que Invisivel, e chegou, com o coração contrito, à Derradeira Vida"
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
